scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && webpack --config webpack.prod.js --progress && screen -dmS back node src/server/index.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build src/server/attachments && mkdir build src/server/attachments
scripts.cleanWindows: rd /s /q build & rd /s /q src\server\attachments & mkdir build & mkdir src\server\attachments
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run copy && screen -dmS front webpack-dev-server --open --progress --config webpack.dev.js && screen -dmS back node src/server/index.js
scripts.startFrontWindows: npm run cleanWindows & npm run copyWindows && webpack-dev-server --open --progress --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.buildWindows: npm run cleanWindows & npm run copyWindows && webpack --config webpack.prod.js --progress
